BuxomPack:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
BuxomPack:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

BuxomPack:FriendlyShock.NAME: Friendly Shock
BuxomPack:FriendlyShock.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Shocks to ALL Allies' draw piles, with !BuxomPack:Scale! bonus damage for each time you gained buxommod:Buxom this turn. NL Exhaust.

BuxomPack:GainBearings.NAME: Gain Bearings
BuxomPack:GainBearings.DESCRIPTION: ALL Allies draw a status card. Draw 1 card.
BuxomPack:GainBearings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL Allies draw !M! status cards. Draw 1 card.

BuxomPack:Fawning.NAME: Fawning
BuxomPack:Fawning.DESCRIPTION: When an Ally exhausts a card, gain !M! buxommod:Milk.

BuxomPack:Motivation.NAME: Motivation
BuxomPack:Motivation.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL buxommod:Bouncy. NL On Exhaust, ALL Allies draw 1 additional card per turn.
BuxomPack:Motivation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL buxommod:Bouncy. NL On Exhaust, ALL Allies draw 1 additional card per turn and immediately draw !M!.

BuxomPack:Consolation.NAME: Consolation
BuxomPack:Consolation.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL buxommod:Bouncy. NL On Exhaust, ALL Allies gain !B! Block and add a copy to your discard pile.

BuxomPack:BlushingStrike.NAME: Blushing Strike
BuxomPack:BlushingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If played by a class other than The Buxom, also gain !M! buxommod:Lactating.

BuxomPack:OmegaEnvy.NAME: Omega Envy
BuxomPack:OmegaEnvy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Absorb ALL non-Buxom Allies' buxommod:Buxom.
BuxomPack:OmegaEnvy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Absorb ALL non-Buxom Allies' buxommod:Buxom

BuxomPack:LiberalLactation.NAME: Liberal Lactation
BuxomPack:LiberalLactation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL Allies gain !M! milk, and !M! again if BuxomMod:Exposed.

BuxomPack:ChibiDeployment.NAME: Chibi Deployment
BuxomPack:ChibiDeployment.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Embarrassing. NL Lose !M! buxommod:Buxom. Target Ally gains a buxommod:Defensive *Chibi.

BuxomPack:LockIn.NAME: Lock In
BuxomPack:LockIn.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Embarrassing. NL BuxomPack:Visualise ALL enemies. Shuffle 2 *Afterswell into your Draw Pile.
BuxomPack:LockIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Embarrassing. NL BuxomPack:Visualise ALL enemies. Shuffle 2 buxommod:Rapidswell into your Draw Pile.
